body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Ralph Perez. How may I assist you today?

Hi, I'm feeling a bit anxious. My name is Virginia Russell. I'm thinking about enrolling my child in your music classes.

I understand, Virginia. We are here to help! To get started, could you please provide your email address?

Sure, my email is virginia.russell@example.com.

Thank you, Virginia. Could I also have a contact number to reach you?

Yes, it's one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

Great, thank you! Can I address any specific concerns you might have?

I'm just worried if it's the right time for my child to start learning music.

That’s a very common concern, Virginia. Our instructors are experienced in teaching students of all ages, starting from kids as young as three.

That’s reassuring to know. Thank you for the information.

You're welcome, Virginia. Thank you for reaching out to us today. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact me anytime. Have a wonderful day!
